Explanation.Log Message: Unauthorized login attempt detected from IP 192.168.1.10.

Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Observations: An unauthorized login attempt has been detected, indicating a security issue.
Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Impact: The system may be vulnerable to further attacks or data breaches.
Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Correlations: Other logs may indicate suspicious activity or access attempts.

Explanation.Conclusion: The unauthorized login attempt is the most likely root cause of the security issue.
